alert.note: Alert for Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:18AM PST until February 23 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 4000 feet, are expected. * WHERE...Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills. * WHEN...4 PM Tuesday to noon Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
